summary.span: 定義及表示動態組件。

span.span: Defines and represents a dynamic assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 動態組件是使用反映發出 Api 建立組件。A dynamic assembly is an assembly that is created using the Reflection Emit APIs. 使用儲存動態組件時，會儲存組件中的動態模組方法。The dynamic modules in the assembly are saved when the dynamic assembly is saved using the method. 若要產生可執行檔必須呼叫方法，來識別組件的進入點的方法。To generate an executable, the method must be called to identify the method that is the entry point to the assembly. 組件會儲存為 Dll 根據預設，除非方法會要求在產生的主控台應用程式或 Windows 應用程式。Assemblies are saved as DLLs by default, unless the method requests the generation of a console application or a Windows-based application. 如果是動態組件包含一個以上的動態模組，組件的資訊清單檔案名稱應該符合模組的名稱指定為第一個引數方法。If a dynamic assembly contains more than one dynamic module, the assembly's manifest file name should match the module's name that is specified as the first argument to the method. 有些方法在基底類別，例如`GetModules`和`GetLoadedModules`，將無法正常運作時從呼叫物件。Some methods on the base class, such as `GetModules` and `GetLoadedModules`, will not work correctly when called from objects. 您可以載入定義動態組件，並載入的組件上呼叫方法。You can load the defined dynamic assembly and call the methods on the loaded assembly. 例如，若要確保傳回的模組清單中，包含資源模組，呼叫`GetModules`上載入物件。For example, to ensure that resource modules are included in the returned module list, call `GetModules` on the loaded object. 使用的動態組件的簽章沒有作用，直到組件儲存至磁碟。The signing of a dynamic assembly using is not effective until the assembly is saved to disk. 因此，強式名稱不適用於暫時性動態組件。So, strong names will not work with transient dynamic assemblies. 若要取得物件，請使用方法。To get an object, use the method. ## 反映發出動態組件的案例Reflection emit dynamic assembly scenarios 下列是使用時要考慮的事項類別來建立動態組件。The following are some things to consider when using the class to create dynamic assemblies. ### 動態模組Dynamic modules 反映發出支援建立動態組件中定義的動態模組。Reflection emit supports the creation of dynamic modules defined in dynamic assemblies. 建立動態組件中的動態模組可以是暫時性或永久性。A dynamic module created in a dynamic assembly can be transient or persistable. ### 型別參考的限制Restrictions on type references 組件可以參考另一個組件中定義的型別。Assemblies can reference types defined in another assembly. 暫時性動態組件可以安全地參考另一個暫時性動態組件、 永久性的動態組件或靜態組件中定義的型別。A transient dynamic assembly can safely reference types defined in another transient dynamic assembly, a persistable dynamic assembly, or a static assembly. 不過，common language runtime 不允許參考類型的暫時性動態模組中定義永久性動態模組。However, the common language runtime does not allow a persistable dynamic module to reference a type defined in a transient dynamic module. 這是因為當之後要儲存到磁碟，執行階段載入保存的動態模組無法解析的參考至暫時性動態模組中定義的類型。This is because when the persisted dynamic module is loaded after being saved to disk, the runtime cannot resolve the references to types defined in the transient dynamic module. ### 發出遠端應用程式定義域的限制Restrictions on emitting to remote application domains 某些情況下會需要建立與遠端應用程式定義域中執行的動態組件。Some scenarios require a dynamic assembly to be created and executed in a remote application domain. 反映發出不允許直接與遠端應用程式定義域發出動態組件。Reflection emit does not allow a dynamic assembly to be emitted directly to a remote application domain. 解決方案是發出動態組件目前的應用程式定義域中，發出動態組件儲存至磁碟，然後載入遠端應用程式定義域中的動態組件。The solution is to emit the dynamic assembly in the current application domain, save the emitted dynamic assembly to disk, and then load the dynamic assembly into the remote application domain. ### 動態組件存取模式Dynamic assembly access modes 您可以使用下列存取模式的其中一種建立動態組件：Dynamic assemblies can be created using one of the following access modes: - 表示的動態組件物件是暫時性。The dynamic assembly represented by an object is transient. 動態組件只可用來執行發出程式碼。The dynamic assembly can only be used to execute the emitted code. - 表示的動態組件物件是否為永續性，但無法執行，直到已經從磁碟載入已儲存的可攜式執行檔 (PE) 檔案。The dynamic assembly represented by an object is persistable but cannot be executed until the saved portable executable (PE) file has been loaded from disk. - 表示的動態組件物件是永久性的但也可以執行之前和/或之後的組件儲存至磁碟。The dynamic assembly represented by an object is persistable, but can also be executed before and/or after the assembly is saved to disk. 必須指定的存取模式，藉由提供適當的呼叫中的值方法時的動態組件定義和稍後無法變更。The access mode must be specified by providing the appropriate value in the call to the method when the dynamic assembly is defined and cannot be changed later. 執行階段使用的動態組件的存取模式，來最佳化組件的內部表示法。The runtime uses the access mode of a dynamic assembly to optimize the assembly's internal representation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義使用一個模組的動態組件。The following code example shows how to define a dynamic assembly with one module. 範例組件中的模組包含一種類型， `MyDynamicType`，其中包含私用欄位、 取得和設定私用欄位的屬性、 建構函式會初始化私用欄位和將私用欄位的使用者提供數字相乘的方法值，並傳回結果。The module in the example assembly contains one type, `MyDynamicType`, which has a private field, a property that gets and sets the private field, constructors that initialize the private field, and a method that multiplies a user-supplied number by the private field value and returns the result. 建立組件時指定的。 is specified when the assembly is created. 立即使用組件程式碼和組件也會儲存至磁碟，以便可以檢查與[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)或用於另一個程式。The assembly code is used immediately, and the assembly is also saved to disk so that it can be examined with [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) or used in another program. [!code-cpp[AssemblyBuilderClass#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyBuilderClass/cpp/24895.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyBuilderClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyBuilderClass/cs/24895.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyBuilderClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyBuilderClass/vb/24895.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `fileName` 不能與任何其他永久性模組、 獨立受管理資源或獨立的資訊清單檔案的相同。`fileName` should not be the same as that of any other persistable module, standalone managed resource, or the standalone manifest file. Managed 的資源檔中會假設為公用。The managed resources in the file are assumed to be public. 指定的資源檔必須儲存組件的目錄中。The specified resource file must be in the directory where the assembly will be saved. > [!NOTE] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，不再需要此成員與旗標。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將資源檔附加至使用動態建立組件`AddResourceFile`。The following code sample demonstrates how to attach a resource file to a dynamically created assembly, using `AddResourceFile`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 它是組件中定義多個具有相同名稱的動態模組的錯誤。It is an error to define multiple dynamic modules with the same name in an assembly. 定義的動態模組是暫時性的。The defined dynamic module is transient. 無法儲存動態模組，即使父動態組件以建立。The dynamic module is not saved, even if the parent dynamic assembly was created with . > [!NOTE] > 若要偵錯動態模組時隱藏最佳化，套用屬性設定為動態組件，然後再呼叫。To suppress optimizations when debugging dynamic modules, apply the attribute to the dynamic assembly before calling . 建立的執行個體與旗標，並將它使用套用方法。Create an instance of with the flag and apply it using the method. 屬性必須套用至動態組件。The attribute must be applied to the dynamic assembly. 如果套用至模組，它沒有任何作用。It has no effect if applied to the module. > [!NOTE] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，不再需要此成員與旗標。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples [Visual Basic、 C#][Visual Basic, C#] 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立暫時性動態模組，使用`DefineDynamicModule`。The code example below demonstrates how to create a transient dynamic module using `DefineDynamicModule`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 它是組件中定義多個具有相同名稱的動態模組的錯誤。It is an error to define multiple dynamic modules with the same name in an assembly. 無法儲存動態模組，即使父動態組件以建立。The dynamic module is not saved, even if the parent dynamic assembly was created with . > [!NOTE] > 若要偵錯動態模組時隱藏最佳化，套用屬性設定為動態組件，然後再呼叫。To suppress optimizations when debugging dynamic modules, apply the attribute to the dynamic assembly before calling . 建立的執行個體與旗標，並將它使用套用方法。Create an instance of with the flag and apply it using the method. 屬性必須套用至動態組件。The attribute must be applied to the dynamic assembly. 如果套用至模組，它沒有任何作用。It has no effect if applied to the module. > [!NOTE] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，不再需要此成員與旗標。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會儲存在這個動態組件中定義的所有非暫時性動態模組。This method saves all non-transient dynamic modules defined in this dynamic assembly. 不會儲存暫時性動態模組。Transient dynamic modules are not saved. 組件檔案名稱可以是下列其中一個模組的名稱相同。The assembly file name can be the same as the name of one of the modules. 若是如此，組件資訊清單會儲存在該模組中。If so, the assembly manifest is stored within that module. `assemblyFileName` 可以是不同的所有組件內所包含之模組的名稱。`assemblyFileName` can be different from the names of all of the modules contained within the assembly. 若是如此，組件檔案包含組件資訊清單。If so, the assembly file contains only the assembly manifest. 每個使用取得，.resources 檔案，並在呼叫這個方法會寫入關閉資料流。For each obtained using , this method writes the .resources file and calls to close the stream. `assemblyFileName`必須是簡單的檔案名稱沒有磁碟機或目錄的元件。The `assemblyFileName` needs to be a simple file name without a drive or directory component. 若要建立組件的特定目錄中，使用其中一種使用目標目錄引數的方法。To create an assembly in a specific directory, use one of the methods that takes a target directory argument. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，這個多載的方法相當於呼叫方法多載如`portableExecutableKind`參數和如`imageFileMachine`參數。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this overload of the method is equivalent to calling the method overload with for the `portableExecutableKind` parameter and for the `imageFileMachine` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立動態組件，然後將它保存到本機磁碟使用`Save`。The following code sample creates a dynamic assembly and then persists it to a local disk using `Save`. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用`SetCustomAttribute`內，並使用。The following code sample illustrates the use of `SetCustomAttribute` within , using a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 有關如何格式化，請參閱 ECMA 第二篇文件以取得詳細資料中的中繼資料規格`binaryAttribute`。See the metadata specification in the ECMA Partition II documentation for details on how to format `binaryAttribute`. 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. `RuntimeConstructorInfo` 由系統產生的一種特殊類型。`RuntimeConstructorInfo` is a special type generated by the system. 它衍生自類別，以及任何您透過反映來取得的物件是實際的執行個體`RuntimeConstructorInfo`。It derives from the class, and any object you obtain through reflection is actually an instance of `RuntimeConstructorInfo`. > [!NOTE] > 不能設定的宣告式安全性屬性。 cannot be used to set declarative security attributes. 使用其中一個多載的採用所需，選擇性的並拒絕權限。Use one of the overloads of that takes required, optional, and refused permissions. > [!NOTE] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，不再需要此成員與旗標。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用`SetCustomAttribute`来附加自訂屬性至動態產生的組件。The following code sample illustrates the use of `SetCustomAttribute` to attach a custom attribute to a dynamically generated assembly.
